alert.note: Alert for Toombs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 2:27PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Toombs County through 300 PM EST... At 227 PM EST, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over South Thompson, or near Lyons, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Santa Claus, South Thompson, Center, Toombs Central, Ohoopee, New Branch, Ponderosa, Rock Springs, Cedar Crossing and Johnson Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for southeastern Georgia.
